title: Sophia Bush takes the plunge in keyhole yellow frock at InStyle Awards
text:
She follows a strict health and fitness regime to feel good and stay in shape all year round.

And Sophia Bush was the belle of the ball on Monday night when she stepped out for the InStyle Awards.

The 37-year-old stunned in a yellow frock that gave a peek at her ample cleavage with its keyhole cut-out.

Peek-a-boo! Sophia Bush gave a peek at her ample cleavage on Monday evening when she stepped out for the InStyle Awards in Los Angeles

Sophia's dress had an embossed print and was fit like a glove over her body.

Her frock featured long bell sleeves and reached down to a little bit below her knees.

She teamed the look with a pair of platform strappy heels and an accompanying rectangular box clutch.

Belle of the ball: Sophia's dress had an embossed print and was fit like a glove over her body

Gorgeous: Sophia accessorised with drop earrings and styled her brunette tresses out effortlessly behind her shoulders

Sophia accessorised with drop earrings and styled her brunette tresses out effortlessly behind her shoulders.

The Chicago P.D. star sported a dewy and contoured complexion that was complete with blushed cheeks and a pop of red on her lips.

Earlier in the day Sophia shared a snippet of her workout on Instagram Stories.

She was seen kneeling and throwing a medicine ball against a wall extremely fast.

Happy days: During the event she posed with Jane Mock

Sophia previously told Style Caster that she loved boxing as a workout for both its mental and physical benefits.

'Boxing trains your mind in such a unique way. Plus, it’s great for my job—all of the stunt work I have to do on Chicago P.D. is only enhanced by my ability to do intense physical choreography when I’m boxing regularly,' she said.

'I’m also trying to do more yoga—I feel like I’m always saying that, but it’s true!—because flexibility is key to strength.'

Grueling session: Earlier in the day Sophia shared a snippet of her workout on Instagram Stories

As for her diet, she told the publication that she keeps things lean and simple for her meals, focusing on whole foods.

'I always try to have a good protein, either a small steak or some lamb (or fish if I haven’t had it for lunch),' she said about what she eats for dinner.

'I’ll do some veggies, and then I try to get creative with a side dish. Lately I’m trying to substitute comfort foods like potatoes and rice with healthier options, so I’ve started experimenting with parsnip mash and cauliflower rice.'
description: Sophia Bush gave a peek at her ample cleavage on Monday evening when she stepped out for the InStyle Awards in Los Angeles. The 37-year-old rocked a yellow form-fitting dress for the event.
authors: Annita Katee For Daily Mail Australia
